title: Fort Scott National Historic Site: Guided Tours
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Guided Tours              Guided Tours       Guided tours are available year round for groups by advance arrangement as staffing permits.. Guided tours should be reserved three weeks in advance. For reservations, call (620) 223-0310. Groups of larger than 50 may be divided. Allow one hour for the guided tour. Guided tours are offered to the public during the summer months, Call ahead for tour times..
